question: 科目
sourceMnemonic: If you've got an <kanji>eye</kanji> on a certain <kanji>course</kanji>, it's a <vocabulary>subject</vocabulary> you really want to take. Maybe you're in school and that means you'll be taking a lot of <vocabulary>course</vocabulary>s. Maybe you're a teacher and you're planning out your <vocabulary>curriculum</vocabulary>. Either way, you have your eye on the course-prize.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
